definition: A term commonly used to refer to individuals who have recently come into existence, typically within a specific timeframe after birth. It is often employed in the context of discussing infants or newborn babies.

examples.german: Die Eltern freuen sich über ihr Neugeborenes.
examples.english: The parents are happy about their newborn.

examples.german: Das Neugeborene hat noch keine Zähne.
examples.english: The newborn doesn't have any teeth yet.
